data.name: AutofireHelp1
data.value: Hold Select+A/B for a second to enable/disable autofire A/B.

data.name: CustomKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the custom kernel?

data.name: CustomWarning
data.value: You need to flash the custom kernel to your NES/SNES Mini. This is only required once. Do you want to continue?

data.name: DeleteElement
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: DeleteElements
data.value: Do you really want to delete {0} elements?

data.name: DeleteGame
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}" game?

data.name: DeletePreset
data.value: Do you really want to delete the "{0}" preset?

data.name: DeleteSavesQ
data.value: Do you really want to delete those save-states?

data.name: DoYouWantCancel
data.value: Do you want to cancel the current operation?

data.name: Donate
data.value: If you like it, you can donate to me. You can find my PayPal in the "About" box.

data.name: DoneYouCanUpload
data.value: Done! You can upload games to your NES/SNES Mini now.

data.name: DownloadCoverQ
data.value: Do you want to try to download box art for "{0}"?

data.name: DumpKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to dump the kernel?

data.name: ExtraArgsInfo
data.value: You can add global command-line arguments which will be appended to all games including the original. This is only for experts!

data.name: FirstRun
data.value: Hello there! I'm very glad that you are using hakchi2. It's very simple to use. Just click "Add more games", select some ROMs, press "Synchronize" and follow the instructions. Good luck!

data.name: FlashNandCQ
data.value: Do you want to flash NAND-C partition image? It will replace all user data.

data.name: FolderContent
data.value: Deleted content will be moved to the Recycle Bin. You can delete this folder permanently or move the games to other folders.

data.name: FoldersSaveQ
data.value: Do you want to save this folder structure?

data.name: FourScreenNotSupported
data.value: Sorry, {0} uses four-screen mode (i.e. the game has additional VRAM memory in the cartridge), and this feature is not supported by the NES/SNES Mini. The game will probably not start. But it should work if other emulator's module installed. Do you want to add this game anyway?

data.name: GGCodeDelete
data.value: Do you want to delete "{0}" code?

data.name: GGCodeExists
data.value: This code already exists. Do you want to edit it?

data.name: GameGenieFormatError
data.value: Invalid Game Genie code "{0}" for game "{1}".

data.name: GameGenieNotFound
data.value: Can't apply Game Genie code "{0}" to game "{1}" - value not found. Maybe this code is for another game?

data.name: InputPreset
data.value: Please input a preset name for the current games selection.

data.name: KernelDumped
data.value: Your original kernel is saved in the "hakchi2/dump" folder. Do not lose it.

data.name: MD5Failed
data.value: Kernel dumped but the MD5 checksum is unknown:

data.name: MD5Failed2
data.value: The kernel is already patched or it's an unknown revision. Please send this message to me (press Ctrl+C). Continue at your own risk.

data.name: MapperNotSupported
data.value: Oops, "{0}" uses mapper #{1} but this mapper is not supported by the NES Mini and the game will probably not start with the default emulator. But it should work if other emulator's module installed. Do you want to add this game?

data.name: MemoryFull
data.value: Sorry, there are {0}MBytes of games, it's too much.

data.name: MemoryStats
data.value: Total writable memory size: {0:F1}MBytes|Available memory for games: {1:F1}MBytes|Used by saves: {2:F1}MBytes|Used by other files: {3:F1}MBytes

data.name: Need3rdPartyEmulator
data.value: Oops, it seems like "{0}" is not going not work correctly with the original emulator. Do you want to use a 3rd party emulator for this game (it needs to be installed)?

data.name: NewGamesUnsorted
data.value: New games are moved to the "Unsorted" folder.

data.name: NoKernelWarning
data.value: First, dump the kernel image of your NES/SNES Mini. You only need to do this once. Do you want to continue?

data.name: NoKernelYouNeed
data.value: No kernel dump found. You need to dump the kernel first.

data.name: NoTelnet
data.value: Can't start Telnet client, seems like it's disabled. You need to enable it first, you can do it in "Control Panel" -> "Programs" -> "Turn Windows features on or off".

data.name: OriginalKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the original kernel?

data.name: PatchQ
data.value: There is patch for "{0}". Do you want to patch this game?

data.name: PleaseTryAgainUSB
data.value: If this problem persists, try using another USB port or cable.

data.name: ReplaceKernelQ
data.value: You already have the kernel dump. If you REALLY want to replace the backup of your kernel and you REALLY understand what you are doing, delete the "hakchi2/dump" folder manually.

data.name: SelectModsInstall
data.value: Select the modules to install on your NES/SNES Mini

data.name: SelectModsUninstall
data.value: Select the modules to remove from your NES/SNES Mini

data.name: TooManyPerFolder
data.value: Warning! It's not recommended to store so many games per folder.

data.name: UninstallFactoryNote
data.value: Don't forget to perform a factory reset if you want to delete all Suspend Points.

data.name: UninstallQ1
data.value: Do you really want to remove all traces of hakchi2 and return your NES/SNES Mini to its original state?

data.name: UninstallQ2
data.value: Done. Wait until the power LED goes out. You also need to flash the original kernel. Do you want to flash the original kernel now?

data.name: VerifyFailed
data.value: Verify failed :O This is not good.
